conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What is a "university entrance qualification" for studying in Germany?

It's a school-leaving certificate (Hochschulzugangsberechtigung) that qualifies you for university study. If your certificate isn’t recognized, you may need to attend a foundation course (Studienkolleg).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How can I check if my non-EU school certificate is accepted in Germany?

Use the DAAD admission database (https://www.daad.de/en/study-and-research-in-germany/plan-your-studies/admission-database/) or Anabin (https://anabin.kmk.org) for detailed evaluations (Anabin is in German only).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s uni-assist, and do I need it?
Uni-assist (https://www.uni-assist.de/en/) evaluates international certificates for many German universities and issues a Preliminary Documentation (VPD) for your application.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, I’m an art student—do I still need a school certificate to apply?
For artistic subjects, some universities may waive this requirement if you submit a portfolio or pass an aptitude test instead.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is my EU school diploma automatically valid in Germany?
Yes, if it’s recognized in your EU country (or Iceland/Liechtenstein/Norway/Switzerland) or from a German school abroad, it’s usually accepted.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s a "Statement of Comparability," and how do I get one?
Issued by the ZAB (https://zab.kmk.org/en/statement-comparability), this German-language document compares your foreign degree to the German system. Apply via their website.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does the Statement of Comparability guarantee admission?
No, it only evaluates your degree—admission depends on the university’s requirements.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
The Anabin website is in German—any alternatives?
The DAAD database offers a general English overview, but Anabin provides more detailed info (use browser translation tools if needed).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who makes the final call on my admission?
The German university you apply to decides, so always check their specific program requirements.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What if my grades don’t match the German system?
Uni-assist’s VPD translates your grades into the German system for universities to assess.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I study in Germany if I’ve already attended university abroad?
Yes, but you may need a Statement of Comparability to evaluate your prior degree for German equivalency.

Where can I manage cookie settings on the DAAD website?
Click "Cookies" at the bottom of the page to adjust preferences—note some data may lack EU-level privacy protection.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Do I need to accept all cookies to use the DAAD site?
No, you can customize settings under "Cookies," but some features may require certain data processing.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s the VPD from uni-assist used for?
It’s an official document showing how your foreign grades convert to the German system, often required for applications.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there exceptions for non-EU applicants with lower certificates?
Only for artistic programs (via portfolios/tests)—otherwise, a Studienkolleg may be required to bridge gaps.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
My country isn’t listed clearly—where else can I check recognition?
Contact the university directly or use Anabin’s advanced filters for less common certificates.

Is the ZAB’s comparability statement free?
The text doesn’t specify fees—visit their application page (https://zab.kmk.org/en/statement-comparability/application) for details.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I apply without a VPD or Statement of Comparability?
Some universities may allow it, but most require one or both for international qualifications—check their website.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What if my DAAD search says my certificate is "partially recognized"?
You’ll likely need a Studienkolleg or additional exams—confirm with the university or Anabin for specifics.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Does uni-assist handle admissions?

No, they only evaluate documents—the university makes all admission decisions.
